title: Remote Support Session — 30 Minutes
short: $20 remote support for quick fixes and guidance.
description: Get rapid, professional remote support to diagnose issues, apply fixes, and guide you through solutions. Ideal for software problems, configuration help, performance tuning, and general troubleshooting. We’ll vet the issue first, then proceed if it’s a fit.
priceNote: Billed after session via invoice or in-person. No upfront charge.
